mapper.sql: select A.id AS sound_id , A.sound_type_id , A.subject , A.singer , A.sound_file_path , A.sound_thumbnail , A.play_time_minute , A.play_time_second , A.flag_use , A.creator , A.created_at , A.updated_at , B.subject AS type_subject
From tb_sound A Left Join tb_sound_type B ON A.sound_type_id = B.id and B.flag_use = 'Y'
mapper.select:
AND A.creator = #{user_id}
ORDER BY A.updated_at DESC, A.created_at DESC
